title: Blue Login Screen (Patch 6.22 Issue)
body:
Well, after I had finished installing the new client and everything, I hit launch. Then nothing appeared but this pure blue page.
I've tried repairing it, (9000 files scanned) but it wont work, I need to get back on the RIFT![](https://twitter.com/ChiemelaR/status/799684993576529921)

replies.body:
Our client devs have been investigating this issue and provided the following workaround for this:

Go to your League of Legends install folder. Default is (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) go to \RADS\system
Locate the user.cfg file and open with notepad
Change leagueClientOptIn = yes to leagueClientOptIn = no
Save and launch League of Legends again.

When you have a chance, head on over to their [pinned post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/irEothGt-workaround-for-launching-the-legacy-client) on the client boards to help them work on a fix.  Thanks!
